 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׁח‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==tear in pieces== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׁח‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּשַׁח‎</span> [[1Sam.15.33|1Sam 15:33]] (Agag), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַשְּׁחֵנִי‎</span> [[Lam.3.11|Lam 3:11]] (of lion, in figure).
